entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as having a leaping heart.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: A person being targeted by Greyback, described as being protected by others.

entities.name: Greyback
entities.description: A werewolf who is trying to attack Dumbledore, but is blasted away by the brutal-faced man.

entities.name: Draco
entities.description: A person being ordered by the brutal-faced man to do something, but his hand is shaking badly.

entities.name: Malfoy
entities.description: The same person as Draco, mentioned as having a shaking hand.

entities.name: the brutal-faced man
entities.description: A person who is giving orders and blasting away Greyback with magic.

relationships.description: Greyback is trying to attack Dumbledore, but is blasted away by the brutal-faced man.
The brutal-faced man is ordering Draco to do something, but his hand is shaking badly.
The brutal-faced man blasts Greyback away with magic.
